column5: I am looking for perch (walleye or pike or even crappie) ice fishing for numbers in Eastern Ontario to entertain a 13yr old (and me).  	Will day-tripdrive 2-2.5 hours from Montréal — to St Lawrence or Ottawa Rivers, or any lakes etc from Montréal West towards Ottawa to Cornwall.   	To walk out from a parking lot/spot or rent a shack, even an overnighter! Have equipment but would buy live or frozen bait depending on regs and/or conditions  thanks all
